channel.title: Jacob Proffer
channel.description: Jacob Proffer is a Front-End Developer working at Elegant Seagulls in Marquette, Michigan.

item.description:
6265 miles. That’s how far I had to travel to get to Tokyo, Japan. Thankfully, I managed to due so in comfort aboard an American Airlines Boeing 787 Dreamliner. The flight, spanning 13 hours and 15 minutes, took place on a Tuesday afternoon out of Chicago O’hare International Airport.

I remember walking up to my designated gate, K5. The plane was about to reach the ...

This is it. Tonight is my last full night within the United States, at least for the next week. As of Wednesday morning, I will touch down at Narita International Airport. Which, if you didn’t know, is in Tokyo, Japan.

This will technically be my second international venture. Though I personally consider it to be my first. I’ve been out of the country once before, m...
